sql: SELECT MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating, MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM movie_info_idx mi_idx, movie_keyword mk, title t WHERE mi_idx.info > '2.0' AND t.production_year < 2010 AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(mi_idx t mk)
 MergeJoin(mi_idx t)
 IndexScan(mi_idx)
 IndexScan(t)
 BitmapScan(mk)
 Leading(((mi_idx t) mk)) */
